name: Nerd Bowl 2017
description: A Super Bowl party for Ben's software friends and their software friends. No understanding or appreciation of football required. This is purely for the fun of getting together and eating guacamole.
what_to_bring: Some drinks or some party food/snacks, or both.
more_info: Really, no appreciation of the game required. This will be a fun gathering at my place. You're also welcome to bring non-computer-nerd plus-ones.
